text:
One of the definite places to see beautiful sunrises in Singapore don't miss the Rooster ringing early morning bells.
We did camping during May, it was very humid even at 4:00pm

Other than that the washroom was very clean and tidy throughout the stay
Dec, cool sea breeze, so windy. Very nice place to camp,  toilet just few steps away with vending machines

Good and quite place to cycle or run.
You can see the plane landing on Changqi one by one.

Great place for camping!
Do note that you need to apply for permit which can be done via axs.

Toilet and carpark are near the campsite which makes things convenient

Knowing that weekends would be packed with people, I chose to ride my bike and pitch my tent on one of the weekdays. Fairly peaceful and you get to enjoy the soft sound of crashing waves during high tide and do some bird watching. The BBQ pits were also vacant most of the time so I got my peace and quiet. Lovely place to catch the sunset and sunrise.
